title: Your Favorite Champion's Ult...
body:
* Deals extra true damage equal to 50% of the target's missing health(minimum 200)
*  Is unlocked at level 1
*  Has unlimited range
*  Is on a 10 second cooldown

Now Teemo can place shrooms of destruction from across the map on a 10 second cooldown...
(Note: The damage is applied for every tick of damage)

replies.body: {{champion:31}}  OmNOMNOMNOMNOMNOMNOMNOM
{{champion:90}}  so ff at 20?

There is NO escaping my main man Malz now!!! lol

Yes, I main Malzahar so much that I like to refer to him as my "main man".

{{champion:30}} 

Hello.
So I'm going to assume the range increase for Riven applies to her wind slash, because extending her sword to global would be... actually kinda funny.
"Who needs to die anyways?" - {{champion:26}}

{{champion:89}} 
Global size, targets the center of the map, stun length is increased to 5 seconds. And it always stuns.
Sounds about right.
Only now did I realize I didn't read the post properly. Whoops!

{{champion:77}} {{item:3070}} 
Unless you count his phoenix burn for the global/50% of the target's missing health?

ok

farm 3 lanes, all jungle, while killing 3 towers and getting a penta?

Screw Teemo, I just became a Global Goddess.
